name: 哈里斯·威尔金森
name_full: 哈里斯·威尔金森 Harris Wilkinson
introduction: Harris Wilkinson started his career writing and producing commercials for Chicago advertising agencies. After selling original screenplays to studios including Universal, New Line, and Lionsgate, he relocated to Los Angeles. He continues to work in features, and is also now writing for television, creating original pilot dramas for Warner Brothers Television, Sony Pictures Television, and NBC, as well as co-creating a drama with Len Wiseman for FOX.
